channel.title: Arrow above object/npc [PI]
channel.description:
I have used this code:
[code]Server.npcHandler.spawnNpc(c, NpcId, X, Y, H, Walking, HP, maxHit, attack, defence, agressive, headIcon));[/code]
It works great but it creates new npc and I dont want to do that. So can any1 give me codes how to add hint icon above npc and object without creating new npc or object?
Please help.

It works great but it creates new npc and I dont want to do that. So can any1 give me codes how to add hint icon above npc and object without creating new npc or object?

Please help.[/quote]
